title: "Sorry but we are unable to start game" Error Causing Dodges & LP Loss
body:
Around 12:30 AM PDT 5/13/17 I have encountered an error which results in queue dodge timer and a loss of LP.
I hope there is a solution to this before getting punished any further.

replies.body: That might have happened if your network lost it's connection to the game server you were going to be playing on, so let's make sure to check up on a some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Make sure to test out those changes in a custom or practice game, and hit me back up if that doesn't get you back on the Rift!
After this was over, I joined a second room, and then received "There was a problem selecting your champion. Please try again." Lost more LP again.
